ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.gui

Class ViewChapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.gui.MediaActivity
        • ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.gui.ViewChapter

  • public class ViewChapter
extends MediaActivity
    This activity displays a specified chapter, based on what is in the lifecycle data. It takes the chapter contents and displays the text, and the choices. It allows a user to navigate to another instance of the view chapter activity, when clicking on a choice.
    Author:
    Alexander Wong, Kim Wu
